input.message: 对比各年级最近一次考试表现

intent_result.merged_query: 对比各年级最近一次考试的表现
intent_result.rewritten_query: 对比各年级最近一次考试的表现

filters.value: (SELECT MAX(term) FROM score s2 WHERE s2.is_deleted = false)

sql_result.sql: WITH latest_term AS (SELECT MAX(term) as max_term FROM score WHERE score.is_deleted = 0), base AS (SELECT class.grade_year, AVG(score.score_value) as avg_score FROM score JOIN student ON score.student_id = student.id JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id CROSS JOIN latest_term WHERE score.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND score.term = latest_term.max_term GROUP BY class.grade_year) SELECT base.grade_year, base.avg_score FROM base ORDER BY base.grade_year

sql_validate_result.executed_sql: WITH latest_term AS (SELECT MAX(term) as max_term FROM score WHERE score.is_deleted = 0), base AS (SELECT class.grade_year, AVG(score.score_value) as avg_score FROM score JOIN student ON score.student_id = student.id JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id CROSS JOIN latest_term WHERE score.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND score.term = latest_term.max_term GROUP BY class.grade_year) SELECT base.grade_year, base.avg_score FROM base ORDER BY base.grade_year

output.merged_query: 对比各年级最近一次考试的表现
output.rewritten_query: 对比各年级最近一次考试的表现
output.summary: 各年级最近一次考试平均分：2022级74.90分、2023级74.94分、2024级75.09分、2025级74.93分；2024级表现最优，各年级整体差异较小。
